unnormalised: Boro, konnem algebra somzunk zai mhunn vicharle, hã? Mhaka ugddas asa, jevhã mhãv 8veent aslolo, algebra mhunnje mhaka mhojea chopplãnt Mount Everest choddtta mhunn distaalem. Ekaekuch, okshoram soglleak denvlolim, fokot English class-antuch nhõi, punn ganitacher dhalle ghaltalim! Ani him ixttagotichi okshoram naslim; tim x ani y asli ani tim tãchea khatir zoddunk sangtalim. *Hush*.
normalised: Haanv, konnennim algebra somzunk sodlam mhunn sanglam, hã? Mhaka ugddas asa hanv class atthint astana, algebra mhaka chaplant mount everest choddttat tench poddlem. Eksaanuch, okshoram soglleakuch dislle, fokot english classintuch nhõi, punn ganitacher ghuri ghalun! Ani him ixttagatichim okshoram nhõi asli; tim x ani y aslim ani tim sangtat tum tanchea khatir utor sodd mhunn. Ugh.

unnormalised: Amcho ganitacho xikxok, Mr. Sharma, ek dhiracho monis aslo (chodd korun). To vostu aso sangtaalo, "Kalpnna kora ki 'x' mhunnje tumkak zai asl'lea samosachi sonkhea, punn tum tankam fokot 5chea packetantuch gheunk xakta." Magir, ekaekuch, 5x somzonk laglem – ti asli samosachi ekun sonkhea! Somikoronnan lahan kotha zaleo, fokot bhiranticho chinnh naslem. To amkam somzunk melltta tea udharonnancho vapor kortalo - zõdi Priya kodden 'a' pustokanchi sonkhea asa ani ti 'b' Rohanak dita, tor tiche kodden kiteak urta? (a-b, spoxttuch!) Lhan vostu, punn tannem bunhead ghott keli.
normalised: Amche ganitache xikxok, Mister Sharma, ek thir monis aslo (chodd korun). To sangtalo, "kalpo 'x' mhunllear kitlim tumaka samosa zai, punn tum fokot panchachea packetantuch gheu yeta." Uprant, eksaanuch, panch x somzonk laglem – tem samosanchem ekun sankhya aslem! Samikornnam lhan kotha zali, bhirantiche chinham nhõi. To amkam somzona tim udahornnam vapurtalo - zann Priya kodden 'a' pustokanchi sankhya asa ani ti Rohanank 'b' deta, kiteak tika kitlim urta? (a minus b, spasht rupan!) Sadhya vostu, punn tenim buniyad bandli.

unnormalised: Mhaka dista, chavi mhunntlear formula-nk lagun tras zaina vochpachi. Mullanchim thoddeanche thodde suruvat korat: variable kitem mhunntlear, constant kitem mhunntlear, ani tim koxi sombondh dovortat? Problemanchim sopan-sopanan votun kam korat. Tum atkun ghelear-ui, soddun diunk naka. Udharonnamni portun pollõiat, vo online vegllea sovloti gheiat. Thoim bhov fukotche tutorial ani practice proshn asat. Udharonnakhatir, 2x + 3 = 7 vori somikoronnan x-ache khatir koxe zoddche tem somzop mhunnje algebra-chi ek soglli duniya ugddi korunk xakta. Hea lhan somikoronnank poilim 3-ak uzve vatten halovun zoddunk zata, taka 2x = 7-3 vo 2x = 4 korta. Nimannek x = 4/2, x = 2 korta.
normalised: Mhaka dista, mahatvachem mhunllear formula-n bharaun vochonk nhõi. Buniyadinchem suruvat kor: variable kitem mhunllear, constant kitem mhunllear, ani tim koxe ekamekank mellttat? Problemancher ek step-by-step kam kor. Tum atkoun poddlo zalear, soddun dium naka. Udahornnam bhair polloi, vo online bhinn resources sod. Tithe chodd fukot tutorials ani practice-chem proxn asat. Udahornnak, don x plus tin satak saman aslem ashem samikornnant 'x' koxem soddunchem hem somzunk algebra-chi ek soglli dunya ugddau yeta. Hem lhan samikornn poilim tin danve vattenk halovun sodvonk zata, tem don x sat minus tink zata vo don x charak saman zata. Nimannem x char donanim bhag korunk zata, x donak saman korun.

unnormalised: Ani khorench, practice khub mhotvachem. Dor disa thodde problem korat, tum 15 minuteankuch korat tori punn. Tem ek bike choloichem vori asa; tum thodde pavtim poddteli, punn nimannek, tumka favo zatolem. Ani jevhã tum korteli, tea tanka, tea kothor somikoronnancho zoddunk khub ruchkar zata. Mhaka ek problem ugddas asa, (a + b)^2 = ? Lamb ratri uprant mhaka nimannem mell'llem. Hea lhan zoitak ek sopan mell'llem ani mhaka dusrea chodd kothor somikoronnancho zoddunk sobhikar zalem.
normalised: Ani satch sangtat, practice mahatvachem. Dor disak thoddim problemam kor, poddlem zalear pandhra minutakuch. Tem bike cholounk xikonk sarkhem asa; tum thoddea pavtim poddtoli, punn nimannem tum sodvonk xiktoli. Ani tum zanna tich vellar, tankam avghodd samikornnam sodovunk kitlench susth zatat. Mhaka ugddas asa ek problem, parenthesis a plus b parenthesis squared prashnchinak saman asa mhunn? Ek lamb ratrik uprant mhaka nimannem tench mell'llem. Hi lhan zoit ek utronnk fator zali ani mhaka dusrea chodd zattil samikornnam sopeyponnan sodovunk dita.

unnormalised: Fokot ugddas dovrat ki algebra chinnham ani somikoronnam von chodd asa; to vichar korpacho ek marg asa, problem zoddpacho ek marg. Ani konn zanna, udya tum algebra-cho vapor korteli to bill dhaba-cher koso vanttcho vo tea nove Royal Enfield-chea khatir bori EMI koxi kaddchi. Bhõv bori naseeb, ani vattent modot magunk bheeu naka!
normalised: Fokot ugddas dovor algebrak fokot chinham ani samikornnam poros chodd asa; ti vichar korpachi rit, problemam sodovpachi rit. Ani konn zanna, kiteak ek dis tum algebrak dhabacher tenka bill vanttuk vo tenka nove Royal Enfield-ak uttom E-M-I gannuk vapurtoli. Bhagevontponn, ani vattent modot magunk bhiyev naka!
